name: earcut
description: The fastest and smallest JavaScript polygon triangulation library for your WebGL apps

scripts.build-dev: mkdirp dist && browserify -d src/earcut.js -s earcut > dist/earcut.dev.js
scripts.build-min: mkdirp dist && browserify src/earcut.js -s earcut | uglifyjs -c warnings=false -m > dist/earcut.min.js

author: Vladimir Agafonkin
